医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
聚糖分析有望用于各种癌症的早期诊断将来，一点唾液可能就足以检测出早期的癌症。哥德堡大学的研究人员开发出一种有效的方法来解释癌细胞中糖分子的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Glycan-analysis-holds-promise-for-early-diagnosis-of-various-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Glycan-analysis-holds-promise-for-early-diagnosis-of-various-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ede0082c-0177-4376-9daa-73a42adf1518 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 09:05:11 -0500 Glycan analysis holds promise for early diagnosis of various cancers
智能手表帮助医生诊断儿童心律失常斯坦福大学医学院的一项新研究表明，智能手表可以帮助医生检测和诊断儿童心律不齐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Smartwatches-help-physicals-to-diagnose-arrhythmias-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Smartwatches-help-physicals-to-diagnose-arrhythmias-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f9064c6-a582-43ec-969e-e8b752f88a56 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 08:15:50 -0500 Smartwatches help physicians to diagnose arrhythmias in children
表观遗传变化可能导致 2 型糖尿病的发生表观遗传变化是否会导致 2 型糖尿病，还是这些变化仅在人患病后才会发生？隆德大学研究人员的一项新研究为表观遗传变化可能导致 2 型糖尿病的观点提供了更多支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Epigenic-changes-can-contribute-to-the-development-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Epigenic-changes-can-contribute-to-the-development-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=634a64e1-0928-4fb5-a8fb-f528e1d50f59 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 07:55:33 -0500 Epigenetic changes can contribute to the development of type 2 diabetes
利用萤火虫液体处理进行实验室开发的测试在本次采访中，News Medical 与 SPT Labtech 讨论了如何利用萤火虫进行实验室开发测试 (LDT)，特别是基于 NGS 文库制备的 LDT 领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Utilizing-firefly-liquid-handling-for-laboratory-development-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Utilizing-firefly-liquid-handling-for-laboratory-development-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d739851-c5bb-4f23-ba68-7a92f65197b8 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 07:50:00 -0500 Utilizing firefly liquid handling for laboratory developed tests
英国援助署向牛津疫苗集团提供资金，用于预防五种流行病威胁的研究牛津疫苗集团 (OVG) 在大流行期间领导了针对 COVID-19 的牛津疫苗的快速临床开发，该集团已获得英国援助总金额 7,788,783 英镑，用于预防五种具有流行或大流行潜力的危险疾病的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/UK-Aid-awards-funding-to-Oxford-Vaccine-Group-for-research-into-prevention-of- Five-epidemic-threats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/UK-Aid-awards-funding-to-Oxford-Vaccine-Group-for-research-into-prevention-of- Five-epidemic-threats.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97d3500e-1eb0-42e5-a51c-c13aebea022e Wed, 13 Dec 2023 07:48:38 -0500 UK Aid awards funding to Oxford Vaccine Group for research into prevention of five epidemic threats
随着服药过量死亡人数上升，数百万阿片类药物和解基金未受影响蒙大拿州开始收到数百万美元用于投资应对阿片类药物危机近一年后，其中大部分资金仍未动用。与此同时，该州阿片类药物过量和死亡人数继续上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Millions-in-opioid-settlement-funds-sit-untouched-as-overdose-deaths-rise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Millions-in-opioid-settlement-funds-sit-untouched-as-overdose-deaths-rise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20e380c9-cf62-473b-898e-dfa761a85573 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 07:24:52 -0500 Millions in opioid settlement funds sit untouched as overdose deaths rise
随着“兴奋性谵妄”诊断的基础破裂，影响蔓延当安杰洛·昆托 (Angelo Quinto) 的家人得知官员将他 2020 年的死亡归咎于“兴奋性谵妄”（这是他们以前从未听说过的一个术语）时，他们简直不敢相信。对他们来说，很明显诊断背后的科学依据并不真实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/As-foundation-for-e28098excited-deliriume28099-diagnosis-cracks-fallout-spreads.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/As-foundation-for-e28098excited-deliriume28099-diagnosis-cracks-fallout-spreads.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1d1852d-3673-4d7c-ab41-5701f6754604 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 07:21:39 -0500 As foundation for ‘excited delirium’ diagnosis cracks, fallout spreads
